section.name: Changes
section.p: This document describes what has changed in Turbine on the 2.1 branch between releases.

ul.li: Fixed error in Mssql unique.vm template (removed a blank line)
ECS, Frremarker ans Webmacro services/modules are marked deprecated. You should use Velocity instead.
Castor service is marked as deprecated. You should use om/peer classes instead!
